chunk_text:
• Bride and Groom may have access throughout the night with WHV staff. ## Our Historical 1858 Restored Home
● $1000 Refundable Security Deposit will be charged one week before the wedding and returned up to 7-10 business days later. ● You must have at least a Day of Coordinator assigned to your event,or one will be provided by WHV at an additional fee due 60 days prior to your event. ● A full vendor list must be sent to WHV 90 days prior to the wedding.
